statements: SELECT * FROM mobile_app_reviews
SELECT user_id, app_name, rating FROM mobile_app_reviews WHERE rating > 3
SELECT review_text FROM mobile_app_reviews WHERE app_name = 'ExampleApp'
SELECT * FROM mobile_app_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT app_name, COUNT(*) AS review_count FROM mobile_app_reviews GROUP BY app_name
SELECT * FROM mobile_app_reviews WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, app_name, rating FROM mobile_app_reviews WHERE app_name = 'App X';
SELECT * FROM mobile_app_reviews WHERE rating >= 4 AND review_text LIKE '%amazing%';
SELECT user_id, app_name, rating, review_text FROM mobile_app_reviews WHERE rating = 5 ORDER BY app_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM mobile_app_reviews WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM reviews WHERE review_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, app_id FROM reviews WHERE rating <= 2;
SELECT * FROM ratings WHERE rating = 5 ORDER BY app_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(rating) AS rating_count FROM ratings GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(rating) > 2;
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT review_id, user_id, app_id FROM reviews WHERE app_id = 100 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT MAX(rating) AS max_rating, MIN(rating) AS min_rating FROM ratings WHERE app_id = 200;
SELECT review_text FROM reviews WHERE user_id = 10 AND review_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS avg_rating, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM reviews WHERE app_id = 300 GROUP BY app_id;
SELECT * FROM reviews;
SELECT review_id, app_id, user_id, rating, review_text FROM reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT app_name, developer FROM apps WHERE developer = 'John Doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'alice123';
SELECT app_name, rating, review_text FROM reviews INNER JOIN apps ON reviews.app_id = apps.app_id ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE rating > 4
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE user_id = '1a2b3c4d-5e6f-7g8h-9i0j-1k2l3m4n5o6'
SELECT app_name, rating FROM reviews JOIN apps ON reviews.app_id = apps.app_id
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY rating DESC, review_id ASC
SELECT COUNT(review_id), AVG(rating) FROM reviews
SELECT * FROM reviews;
SELECT review_id, rating FROM reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT app_name, app_category FROM apps ORDER BY app_category ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT app_id, AVG(rating_value) AS avg_rating FROM ratings GROUP BY app_id;
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM reviews JOIN ratings ON reviews.review_id = ratings.review_id WHERE rating_value >= 4.5 ORDER BY review_text ASC;

SELECT users.username, apps.app_name, ratings.rating_value FROM users, apps, ratings WHERE users.user_id = ratings.user_id AND apps.app_id = ratings.app_id ORDER BY users.username ASC, apps.app_name DESC;
SELECT app_name, COUNT(*) as total_reviews FROM reviews JOIN apps ON reviews.app_id = apps.app_id GROUP BY app_name HAVING total_reviews > 3 ORDER BY total_reviews DESC;
SELECT app_name, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM reviews JOIN ratings ON reviews.review_id = ratings.rating_id GROUP BY app_name HAVING avg_rating > 4 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM reviews;
SELECT review_id, user_id, app_id, rating FROM reviews WHERE rating > 4.0;
SELECT app_name, description FROM apps ORDER BY app_name ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT app_name, category_name FROM apps INNER JOIN app_categories ON apps.app_id = app_categories.app_id;
SELECT * FROM reviews ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT app_name, description FROM apps WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT app_id, user_id, rating FROM ratings WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY date_rated DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT app_name, category_name FROM apps INNER JOIN app_categories ON apps.app_id = app_categories.app_id ORDER BY app_name ASC;
